statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); time=$(date '+%Y/%m/%d %T'); short_dir=$(basename "$current_dir"); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf "📁 %s  %s │ 🤖 %s │ 🕐 %s" "$short_dir" "$git_branch" "$model" "$time"; else printf "📁 %s │ 🤖 %s │ 🕐 %s" "$short_dir" "$model" "$time"; fi
